name: The Salup Group
tag_list: public-relations, digital-marketing, fashion, food, restaurants, mobile-pr, iphone-app-pr, ipad-app-pr, technology, social-television, branding
overview:
The Salup Group is a brand development and communications company that innovates and implements multi-channel brand strategies that include digital marketing campaigns, public relations programs- mobile, social and traditional, brick and mortar and online promotional initiatives.

The Salup Group recently launched a new division specializing in building lifestyle brands around mobile apps and digital platforms through publicity, social, and mobile marketing. Recent mobile clients include iPad app-Flexfolios and iPhone app and social network-Twiddish and iphone app GoodCab BadCab.

In 2004 the agency launched a new media and technology division launching campaigns for clients such as iAmplify.Com, Tango Media, Works by Nicole Williams, Partsearch Technologes and Internet TV Show, Cooking with Nonna.

The agencies foundation is rooted in traditional PR, marketing, and strategic events with a broad client portfolio of authors, beauty, fashion, food and fitness personalities, restaurants, retail and celebrity events. Clients include HGTV, Dots, DKNY, Vern Yip, Lisa LaPorta, Monica Rich Kosann, The Greenporter Hotel, Cuvee Bar & Bistro, and more.
